nodes.text: A-13 was a landing pad that was located on the moon Pinett. During the time of the Galactic Civil War, a group of protesters from the Pinett Freedom Force occupied the pad and attempted to prevent starships from landing there. However, the group inadvertently activated a tractor beam in the bay, which pulled a Jon-Tow Economic Development Group freighter out of orbit of Pinett and sent the vessel hurtling towards the moon.
